titleStmt.title: A true declaration of the troublesome voyadge of M. Iohn Haukins to the parties of Guynea and the west Indies, in the yeares of our Lord 1567. and 1568
titleStmt.author: Hawkins, John, Sir, 1532-1595.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Poules Churchyarde, by Thomas Purfoote for Lucas Harrison, dwelling at the signe of the Crane,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: M. Iohn Haukins last voyadge.
Reproductions of the original in the the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Appears at reel 385 and at reel 926 (same copy filmed twice).
